# Geonosis Prompt Templates

Reusable prompt templates for common development tasks. Use these with GitHub Copilot.

## Available Templates

| Template | Use Case |
|----------|----------|
| api-endpoint.prompt.md | Create a new FastAPI router endpoint |
| sqlalchemy-model.prompt.md | Create a new database model |
| pydantic-schema.prompt.md | Create request/response schemas |
| react-component.prompt.md | Create a new React component |

## Usage

Reference these templates when asking Copilot to generate code, or copy and customize them for specific tasks.
